references.paper_title: Data Shapley: Equitable valuation of data for machine learning
references.reason: This paper introduces Data Shapley, a foundational method for data valuation that heavily influences the current work.
This paper introduces the Maximum Mean Discrepancy (MMD), a crucial statistical measure used as the core of the proposed valuation method.

references.paper_title: Robust Estimation of a Location Parameter
references.reason: This paper introduces the Huber model, used to theoretically model data heterogeneity and justify the choice of MMD.

references.paper_title: Data valuation in machine learning: "ingredients", strategies, and open challenges
references.reason: This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of the field of data valuation, which the current work builds upon and extends.

references.paper_title: Robust covariance and scatter matrix estimation under Huber's contamination model
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical results on robust covariance and scatter matrix estimation under Huber's contamination model, which supports the analysis of data heterogeneity in the proposed framework.
